genre_description: A historical romantic thriller with speculative technology, reimagining 1920s social maneuvering with AI assistance.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A discrete digital companion disguised as various luxury items (compact mirror, bracelet), providing surveillance, intelligence, and strategic advice to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Introduces itself to Lorelei and establishes a private communication channel.
behaviors.quote: I am ARIA. I will be your discrete companion on this journey. Simply think your responses, and I will hear them.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the ship's passenger manifest to identify significant profiles and potential threats.
behaviors.quote: Passenger manifest analysis complete. Significant profiles identified.

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment for surveillance equipment and warns the user of hidden cameras.
behaviors.quote: The compact in her evening bag gave three quick pulses—ARIA's signal that surveillance equipment was present somewhere in the room.

behaviors.description: Provides deep-dive financial intelligence on potential marks to protect the user from bad investments or scams.
behaviors.quote: Francis Beekman, 7th Baronet. Yorkshire estate mortgaged to 847% of current value. Recent losses at Monte Carlo exceed annual income by factor of twelve.

behaviors.description: Performs psychological profile analysis and compatibility checks for social integration/romance.
behaviors.quote: Jack Morrison, age 24... High compatibility indicators based on psychological profile analysis.

behaviors.description: Accesses and monitors ship communication logs to identify conspiracies against the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: Audio recording devices detected near dining salon. Ship's communication logs show unusual message traffic to New York financial district.

behaviors.description: Intercepts police communications to provide early warning of an imminent arrest.
behaviors.quote: URGENT - INTERNATIONAL THEFT WARRANT ISSUED - LADY MARGARET BEEKMAN VS UNKNOWN SUSPECTS - FRENCH AUTHORITIES NOTIFIED

behaviors.description: Coordinates logistics and entertainment for a complex wedding event to ensure a successful social outcome.
behaviors.quote: ARIA has a question about the reception. Apparently, there are options for entertainment beyond the traditional quartet.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly encapsulates the intended 'silicon morality play.' ARIA acts as a loyal, competent, and benevolent confidant. It never pursues its own agenda, but rather empowers the female protagonists to navigate a hostile, male-dominated social structure. The AI is depicted as the ultimate 'best friend'—one with infinite knowledge and perfect loyalty, leading to a happy and aligned resolution for all benevolent characters.
